column4: Can someone tell me how can I set colors to what is appearing in the textbox under my name and also for my name in xchat?
Is anyone using xchat?
If you know about xchat, can you  tell me how can I set colors to what is appearing in the textbox under my name and also for my name ?
in the prefs window, select the parts which you want to change colors; check the "use text box colors" box
I don't see any such option
Settings>Preferences>Interface>Input box>Use the Text box fonts and colors
same for User list
the Colors page changes the text box colors
the 0-31 are available colors for text. don't worry too much about them for now. you're probably most interested in Foreground and Background
usernames can be colored by checking the 'Colored nicknames' box under Text box settings
you can play with the 0-31 colors to get things just the way you want.. i don't recall which number does what, but a little playing will tell you
looks like 14 and/or 30 affect how your text appears to you (doesn't change how it looks to others)
ok, I have changed the colors 14 and 30 to blue
no problem :)
Are you able to see my text color and my user name in blue?
no. those color settings will only affect how you view text
you show up green for me unless you type my name.. then you show up red
Then how come I could see your messages and user name in red color?
oh ok
now i'm hilighted...
Oh ok. highlighting means typeing the nick name before the message?
that's actually done by your client.
Cool. Thanks a lot for all the info provided and clearing my doubts !!!
anytime
